amendment.description: To provide for an audit of funds appropriated under this Act by the General Accounting Office, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1850 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1850 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Clinton. (consideration: CR S12794; text: CR S12794) To provide for an audit of funds appropriated under this Act by the General Accounting Office, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1850 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1850 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Clinton.
